sourcesContent:
import { StyleSheet } from "react-native";

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        flex: 1,
        height: "auto",
        backgroundColor: "whitesmoke",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "flex-start",
        padding: 10,
    },
    heading: {
        fontSize: 20,
        fontFamily: "Poppins_400Regular",
        color: "black",
        marginTop: 20,
    },
    inputRow: {
        flexDirection: "row",
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        alignItems: "center",
        marginBottom: 10,
        marginHorizontal: 20,
    },
    label: {
        width: "30%",
        fontSize: 16,
        color: "black",
        fontFamily: "Poppins_400Regular",
    },
    labels: {
        width: "30%",
        fontSize: 16,
        color: "black",
        fontFamily: "Poppins_400Regular",
        marginLeft: 10,
    },
    timeField: {
        flexDirection: "row",
        justifyContent: "center",
        alignItems: "center",
        height: 35,
        margin: 12,
        borderWidth: 1,
        alignItems: "center",
        borderColor: "#777",
        width: "65%",
        borderRadius: 8,
        backgroundColor: "white",
    },
    inputField: {
        height: 35,
        margin: 12,
        borderWidth: 1,
        padding: 10,
        borderColor: "#777",
        width: "65%",
        borderRadius: 8,
        backgroundColor: "white",
    },
    ingredientsView: {
        padding: 10,
        backgroundColor: "#fcfdfd",
        borderRadius: 10,
        marginBottom: 10,
    },
    ingredientLabel: {
        fontSize: 18,
        color: "black",
        fontFamily: "Poppins_400Regular",
        textAlign: "center",
    },
    ingredientNo: {
        height: 35,
        margin: 12,
        borderWidth: 1,
        padding: 10,
        borderColor: "#777",
        width: "20%",
        borderRadius: 8,
        backgroundColor: "white",
        float: "left",
    },
    nameField: {
        height: 35,
        margin: 12,
        borderWidth: 1,
        padding: 10,
        borderColor: "#777",
        width: "45%",
        borderRadius: 8,
        backgroundColor: "white",
        float: "left",
    },
    quanField: {
        height: 35,
        margin: 12,
        borderWidth: 1,
        padding: 10,
        borderColor: "#777",
        width: "45%",
        borderRadius: 8,
        backgroundColor: "white",
        float: "left",
    },
    addDishButton: {
        backgroundColor: "rgb(247, 124, 67)",
        padding: 8,
        borderRadius: 5,
        marginVertical: 10,
        width: 150,
        alignItems: "center",
        marginRight: 5,
    },
    removeBtn: {
        marginLeft: 5,
    },
    buttonText: {
        color: "white",
        fontSize: 16,
        fontFamily: "Poppins_500Medium",
        marginTop: 2,
    },
    addBtn: {
        marginHorizontal: 20,
    }
});

export default styles;
